Posts.Content: Nov 18, 2008 02:34PM Texylin wrote: Hi!  I just had my 6th round of  avastin and abraxane .  So far, side effects have been minimal.  The main side effect I've had is problems with  high blood pressure and headaches that are from the avastin.  My doc does give me premeds though, even though it's not required.  No bad taste, no nausea and my hair is taking its time to fall out.  Its just recently started  to thin out.  Makes me wonder if chemo is working.  Won't have a ct until mid-December, so won't know till then.  If you have  any other questions, let me know. Linda
Posts.Title: New chemo drug Spring08 slonedeb
